pkgmetadata.longdescription: PayPlug Bindings for Python===========================A Python library for PayPlug's API.Installation------------You can install this package by using the pip tool and installing: $ pip install payplug --upgradeOr via easy_install: $ easy_install payplug --upgradeCreate a PayPlug Account------------------------Sign up for a PayPlug account at : https://www.payplug.com/portal2/signupUsing PayPlug API-----------------Documentation for Python is here : https://www.payplug.com/docs/api?python
